title: Counter-Strike_1.6_V42_DiGiTALZONE
description:
Counter-Strike 1.6 V42 NonSteam - DiGiTALZONE

Release 16.6.2011

System Requirements:
- Minimum: 500 mhz processor, 96mb ram, 16mb video card, Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7
- Recommended: 800 mhz processor, 128mb ram, 32mb+ video card, Windows XP/Vista/7

Features:
- Clean rip from Steam
- No modifications, except where noted.
- Protocol 48
- Playable on LAN and Nonsteam Servers
- Half-Life is Included
- Steam Account is not required.
- RevEmu 9.85
- Dedicated Server

Modifications:
- CZ Bots added
- Original models instead of CZ ones.
- Uses Setti masterserver for a list of nonsteam servers


First install the game, then patch

Patch:
- Fixed Favorites
- Newer engine code
- LAN servers should now work for everyone.
